title: 'NoneType' object has no attribute 'shape'
body:
Hi, I was trying to train the model, but it says like this in the third step:

Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "train.py", line 170, in <module>
    args.checkpoint_after, args.val_after)
  File "train.py", line 80, in train
    for batch_data in train_loader:
  File "/root/miniconda3/envs/myconda/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/utils/data/dataloader.py", line 336, in __next__
    return self._process_next_batch(batch)
  File "/root/miniconda3/envs/myconda/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/utils/data/dataloader.py", line 357, in _process_next_batch
    raise batch.exc_type(batch.exc_msg)
AttributeError: Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/root/miniconda3/envs/myconda/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/utils/data/dataloader.py", line 106, in _worker_loop
    samples = collate_fn([dataset[i] for i in batch_indices])
  File "/root/miniconda3/envs/myconda/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/utils/data/dataloader.py", line 106, in <listcomp>
    samples = collate_fn([dataset[i] for i in batch_indices])
  File "/home/lightweight-human-pose-estimation.pytorch-master/datasets/coco.py", line 46, in __getitem__
    sample = self._transform(sample)
  File "/root/miniconda3/envs/myconda/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torchvision/transforms/transforms.py", line 49, in __call__
    img = t(img)
  File "/home/lightweight-human-pose-estimation.pytorch-master/datasets/transformations.py", line 10, in __call__
    h, w, _ = sample['image'].shape
AttributeError: 'NoneType' object has no attribute 'shape'

What's happening? Can somebody help me? thank u
